name: SoftWar Cyber Fight
storyline:
John Doe, a young college programmer boy opens an email one day and downloads the program that changes his life forever, the ILOVEYOU Virus, a sentient piece of malware that oddly enough signs up to be his assistant, and boasts of its ability to love!

The main cast of SoftWar is a bright group of young characters facing modern problems in the intellectual age, where information takes utmost importance, and a new generation of malware endangers everyday technology. Incidents will lead to one and another, making a path to uncover a grand conspiracy involving the new cyberworld. It is the heroes' role to get to the bottom of these issues and solve them!
summary: A Science-Fiction Visual Novel Role-Playing Game with a story centered on the cyberworld conflicts. New"SoftWars" are battles involving sentient softwares namely viruses and anti-viruses, deciding the fates of computer systems.
